blogPost.excerpt: Sherlock is a free Chrome plugin that analyzes price trends, permit history, sale history, demographics, quality of life, healthcare access, and more for every home on sale on Zillow and Redfin.
blogPost.body: Sherlock is a free Chrome plugin that analyzes price trends, permit history, sale history, demographics, quality of life, healthcare access, and more for every home on sale on Zillow and Redfin.
blogPost.title: Sherlock by ZeroDown - Instant real estate insight
blogPost.author: Hariharan Joghee Chandran

localize.description: Sherlock是一款免费的Chrome插件，它可以分析Zillow和Redfin上每一栋在售房屋的价格趋势、许可历史、销售历史、人口统计、生活质量、医疗服务等。
Sherlock是一款免費的Chrome插件，它可以分析Zillow和Redfin上每一棟在售房屋的價格趨勢、許可歷史、銷售歷史、人口統計、生活質量、醫療服務等。
